articles.author: Kari Anderson
articles.title: Women's Euro 2025 final: England stuns Spain in penalties to earn second-straight Euro title - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: The Lionesses’ incredible luck continued, as Chloe Kelly's decisive penalty kick helped defend its European crown.
articles.content: England came into Sundays UEFA Euro 2025 final looking for revenge and got it. Two years after losing to Spain in the 2023 FIFA Womens World Cup, the Lionesses defeated Spain in penalties, 1(3) - 1(1… [+2043 chars]
